channel.title: [pi] help!
channel.description:
i want to rename my quest's...
i have made a bank tab and the bank tabs works but on the Quest it is blank..
I need to know how i can change it from being blank to saying Bank
can anyone please help me.

item.title: [pi] help!
item.dc:creator: @tylarotheog tylarotheog
item.description:
@tylarotheog wrote:

its in the server folder, client.java search for public void update() {
under that add your line, put your mouse on the quest you wanna rename etc-7332 and add under public void update
add getPA().sendFrame126("Bank", 7341); //quest title
and before that for colour add orange=@or1@, green=@gre@, Purple=@mag@ red=@red@ yellow=@yel@ blue= @blu@ white @whi@
it would look like this getPA().sendFrame126("@or1@Bank", 7341); //quest title

Read full topic
